Issue.creator: vijaypunugubati
Issue.summary: fabric-chaincode-java-merge job: cloudflare timeout error to get list of version from Maven artifactory in fabric-chaincode-shim:testCompileClasspath
Issue.description: Task :fabric-chaincode-shim:assemble 00:01:49.602 > Task :fabric-chaincode-shim:compileTestJava 00:01:55.102 > Task :fabric-chaincode-shim:compileTestJava FAILED 00:01:55.102 00:01:55.102 FAILURE: Build failed with an exception. 00:01:55.102 00:01:55.102 * What went wrong: 00:01:55.120 Execution failed for task ':fabric-chaincode-shim:compileTestJava'. 00:01:55.120 > Could not resolve all files for configuration ':fabric-chaincode-shim:testCompileClasspath'. 00:01:55.120 > Could not resolve junit:junit-dep: 4.9,). 00:01:55.120 Required by: 00:01:55.120 project :fabric-chaincode-shim > com.github.stefanbirkner:system-rules:1.17.0 00:01:55.120 > Failed to list versions for junit:junit-dep. 00:01:55.120 > Unable to load Maven meta-data from https://jitpack.io/junit/junit-dep/maven-metadata.xml. 00:01:55.120 > Could not get resource 'https://jitpack.io/junit/junit-dep/maven-metadata.xml'. 00:01:55.120 > Could not GET 'https://jitpack.io/junit/junit-dep/maven-metadata.xml'. Received status code 522 from server: Origin Connection Time-out 00:01:55.120 00:01:55.120 * Try: 00:01:55.120 Run with --stacktrace option to get the stack trace. Run with --info or --debug option to get more log output. Run with --scan to get full insights. 00:01:55.120 00:01:55.120 * Get more help at https://help.gradle.org 00:01:55.202 00:01:55.202 Deprecated Gradle features were used in this build, making it incompatible with Gradle 6.0. 00:01:55.202 Use '--warning-mode all' to show the individual deprecation warnings. 00:01:55.203 See https://docs.gradle.org/5.6.2/userguide/command_line_interface.html#sec:command_line_warnings/ code placeholder {code} *Build Logs:* https://jenkins.hyperledger.org/view/Merge/job/fabric-chaincode-java-merge-x86_64/104/console https://jenkins.hyperledger.org/view/Merge/job/fabric-chaincode-java-merge-x86_64/lastFailedBuild/artifact/ >
